title: The Double Wager
description: An impudent young beauty wagers her most precious possession that she can become the wife of the most handsome, worldly and bored lord in London. In this high-risk game of love, what will happen if she loses . . . or wins? Mary Balogh is the winner of the Romantic Times Award for Best New Regency Writer in 1985.
author: Mary Balogh
